addFaq.contact_details_info: It is extremely important that you keep your contact information on your account updated at all times. To update your address, phone numbers and email address, please login to your account and edit your contact details under the “Your Contact Details” link on the left navigation. To make changes to your account, you will also need to enter an Online Authorization Code (OAC) that will be sent to your registered mobile phone on your account and to your registered email address to authenticate this transaction.

searchexperience.feedback_tooltip: Enabling Result feedback allows your end users rate the relevancy of results provided for a search query.Once enabled insights will be available in 'Search Insights' under the Analytics Section
searchexperience.click_on_searchbox: Click on search box to customize border and fill color
searchexperience.click_search_icon: Click on search icon to change the icon as per your choice
searchexperience.click_on_text: Click on the text to customize text content and color
searchexperience.click_on_button: Click on the button to customize button text, fill color and border color
searchexperience.recommended_file_size: Recommended icon size : 26X26 pixels, less than 5 kb
searchexperience.not_sure: Not Sure! What you can do with these interaction settings?
searchexperience.it_is_recommended: It is recommended to go through this guide before customizing interactions.
searchexperience.to_enable_the_user: to enable the user to see their Frequently or recently searched queries. These queries will appear as cards in the search window as soon as the user puts their cursor in the search bar
searchexperience.saves_the_time: Saves the time and effort for the users by predicting the rest of the word as the user is typing
searchexperience.reduces_users_time: reduces user’s time to search a query by providing suggestions which help users to enter long queries or select a query as they type.
searchexperience.enhances_users: enhances user’s search experience by showing the results while entering the query and allows the user to see search results without needing to redirect to the results page
searchexperience.when_both_are_enabled: when both are enabled the live search results appear at the background of the query suggestions and the user can scroll to browse the results.

useronboarding.searchAssist_allows_you_to_validate: SearchAssist allows you to validate the configuration and search experience before deploying the app by just clicking on the Test button.

businessRules_contextual_rules_allow: Contextual Rules allows you to define outcomes based on various conditions set by you on search context or Page context or the User context.

businessRules_define_rule_without_condit: Defining a rule without condition can have unexpected impact on search relevance.

addFaq_contact_details_info: It is extremely important that you keep your contact information on your account updated at all times. To update your address, phone numbers and email address, please login to your account and edit your contact details under the “Your Contact Details” link on the left navigation. To make changes to your account, you will also need to enter an Online Authorization Code (OAC) that will be sent to your registered mobile phone on your account and to your registered email address to authenticate this transaction.

contentSource_no_content: You haven’t added any content data yet!
contentSource_no_content_info: The Content is the data ingested into SearchAssist that is indexed to answer search user queries. SearchAssist allows you to add content by crawling web domains and uploading documents.
contentSource_no_search_query: Your Search Query doesn't match with any record.
fields_searchable_desc: The value of the field can be used to make the content of the field ready to be searched
fields_auto_suggest_desc: The value of the field can be used to provide auto-suggestions to complete the query
settings_associate_an_app_with_SA_descri: Associate an app with your Search Assistant to securely enable the Web / Mobile Client.
settings_hosted_by_Kore_ai_to_start_info: Use the Web / Mobile Client hosted by Kore.ai to start interating with the Search Assistant.
settings_share_this_url_with_users_info: Share this URL with the users to interact with your Search Assistant.

settings_copy_and_paste_HTML_desc_info: Copy and paste the following HTML code before the end of the BODY tag on every page of the application where you want to display the chat widget.
settings_to_start_interacting_via_embeed: To start interacting with the  Search Assistant via the embedded code:
settings_whitelist_domains_below_only_do: Whitelist domains below. Only domains added here will be able to display the chat widget
settings_setup_configure_web_mobileSDK_: Setup and configure the Web / Mobile SDK using the prebuilt libraries.
genaralSettings_smalltalk_refres_to_desc: Small Talk refers to the casual conversations that a Search app can have with the end-users. Search apps that can answer social inputs like "How Are You?" are more likely to create a positive impression and help build an invaluable connection with the user.
onboarding_browser_video_tag: Your browser does not support the video tag.
app_menu_utlization_80%: You have utilized more than 80% of your current plan, please upgrade plan to enjoy uninturrepted services.
app_menu_percent_of_queries: Percentage of queries asked by the user
addFaq_displays_responses_to_user: Displays responses to users based on the conditions provided.
addFaq_display_responses: Displays responses to users without any condition.
addFaq_display_responses_to_other_altern: Displays responses to other alternate form of questions.

search_insights_no_of_times_atleast_one_: Number of times where at least one result of the query was clicked on by the end-users
user_engagement_no_of_unique_users_perfo: Number of unique users performed search during the selected period
user_engagement_no_of_new_users_performe: Number of new users performed search during the selected period

user_engagement_volume_of_users_that_per: Volume of users that performed searches at different hours of the day

dash_board_no_of_unique_users_perfromed_: Number of unique users performed search during the selected period
dash_board_total_no_of_searches_perfrome: Total number of searches performed during the selected period
dash_board_total_no_of_searches_that_ret: Total number of searches that returned at least one result
dash_board_no_of_searches_where_atleast_: No. of searches where at least one result was clicked on by the search user
dash_board_average_position_of_click_per: Average position of the clicks performed on the search results
dash_board_position_which_search_results: Position at which the search results were clicked on by the end - users most number of times.
invoices_after_subscribing_to_any_of_pla: After subscribing to any of the plans offered, your invoices will appear here
plan_your_subscription_is_valid_till_inf: Your Subscription is valid till the end of billing cycle -
plan_post_billing_cycle_your_app_info: Post billing cycle your app will not respond to the end users
plan_however_you_will_have_access_15days: However, you will have access to your app for 15 more days after cancellation to either reactive or take a backup of your application. After 15 days your app will be permanently deleted.

plan_are_you_sure_you_want_to_revert: Are you sure you want to Revert?
plan_your_cancellation_will_be_reverted_: Your cancellation request will be reverted and current plan will be retained

plan_compare_the_features_info: Compare the features of each plan and find the one that suits you best.
plan_thankyou_for_your_order_desc: Thank you for your order, please wait while we get the order confirmation details.
plan_looks_like_it_is_taking_longer_desc: Looks like it is taking longer than usual to process your transaction.
plan_you_can_either_choose_to_wait_desc: You can either choose to wait or close this window to continue with your work. We will let you know once the payment is done.
plan_we_will_send_you_an_email_info: We will send you an email if we need any further information from you. You can either wait or close this window to continue with your work.
plan_you_can_also_compare_and_upgrade_de: You can also compare and upgrade to Enterprise plan
plan_are_you_sure_you_want_to_continue: Are you sure you want to continue?

header_workspaces_from_your_org_desc: Workspaces from your organisation that you can join

contentSource_maximum_upload_of_file: Note: Maximum upload limit is 10 files not exceeding 15 MB per file.

home_create_a_new_search_app_from_scratc: Create a new Search App from scratch.
home_data_is_fetched_from_variours_sourc: Data is fetched from various sources and ingested into the application for accurate search results
home_documents_and_fields_are_manipulate: Documents and fields are manipulated to customize the data and results as per the business requirements
home_resuts_are_tuned_based_on_desc: Results are tuned based on relevance to continuously improve the Search Experience
home_search_experience_is_enchanced_by_d: Search Experience is enhanced by defining the presentation of the search interface and results
home_search_experience_isenchaced_desc: Search experience is enhanced by defining the presentation of the search interface and results
home_multiple_index_and_search_configura: Multiple index & search configuration can be tested to pick the best one that fulfills business needs
home_no_apps_found_that_matches_with: No apps found that matches with
home_how_would_you_like_to_create_app_de: How would you like to create your first App?
home_explore_search_assist_using_sample_: Explore SearchAssist using sample data for various use cases with  pre-built search experiences
home_start_by_craeting_a_new_app_from_sc: Start by creating a new App from scratch by adding your data and building custom search experiences
home_few_clicks_away_from_creating_your_: Few clicks away from creating your Search Experience
home_create_seemless_search_experience_d: Create seamless Search Experiences for various use cases and customize it according to your business needs.
home_give_a_name_to_your_App: Give a name to your App
home_choose_sample_data: Choose the sample data you would like to start with
home_the_ecommerce_sample_dataset_desc: The E-Commerce sample dataset comes with a product catalog of cosmetics like lipsticks, perfumes for different sample brands.
home_whats_included_in_the_sample_app: What’s included in this Sample App
home_structured_dataset_with_fileds_like: Structured dataset with fields like name, description, price, images, reviews and more
home_result_card_are_tailored_desc: Result cards are tailored for E-Commerce experience
home_bussiness_rules_to: Business rules to persoanlize the results based on the brand name, price and ratings
home_i_am_lokking_for_best_selling: I am looking for best selling lipsticks
home_the_knowledge_use_case_contains_inf: The Knowledge use case contains a sample dataset that includes crawled  web pages and documents from various repositories of a supply chain company that wishes to implement search at an enterprise level.
home_unstructured_dataset_like_web_pages: Unstructured dataset like web pages and documents from various data repositories like GDrive, Confluence etc
home_result_template_tailored_desc: Result templates tailored to enhance the Knowledge Search Experience
home_bussiness_rules_to_peronalise: Business rules to personalize the results based on the search context
home_confluence_pages_created_desc: confluence pages created by peter about asset managers
home_how_do_i_create_a_rfq: How do i  create a rfq
home_get_me_gdrive_docs_desc: Get me gdrive docs created by Dwayne Chris & Justin Mayer
home_the_website_search_usecase_is_info: The Website search use case  is an implementation of search on a banking website. The sample dataset are web pages containing details on offers, loans, investments and credit card offerings
home_what_included_in_this_sample_app: What’s included in this Sample App
home_unstructural_dataset_which_includes: Unstructured dataset which includes web pages crawled from the banking website on various services and offerings.
home_bbussiness_rules_to_personalise_the: Business rules to personalize the results based on the user’s portfolio and interests
home_how_do_i_apply_for_personal_loan: how do i apply for a personal loan
home_what_are_the_benifits_on_mintlet_ca: What are the benefits on mintlet card
home_i_want_to_pay_my_credit_card_bill: I want to pay my credit card bill
home_what_are_the_benifits_on_my_travel_: What are the benefits on my travel card
home_a_tradiational_search_bar_desc: A traditional Search Bar Experience where end users query your website using a Search Bar that is usually positioned at the top of your website.
home_a_unique_search_experience_desc: A unique Search Experience tailored to integrate a search plus chat experience to your end users and is ususally positioned like a Virtual Assistant.
home_are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete: Are you sure you want to delete?
home_are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_acc: Are you sure you want to remove access?
home_removing_access_info: Removing access on shared app will only remove your access of the application
home_deleting_your_application_desc: Deleting your application will also delete all your indexes, Sources & other Application Data.
home_are_you_sure_want_to_continue: Are you sure you want to continue?
home_your_browser_doesnot_support_video_: Your browser does not support the video tag.
home_just_few_more_details: just few more details about you!
home_watch_a_quick_desc: Watch a quick introductory video on the SearchAssist’s features.
index_Settings_multilangual_support_desc: Multilingual support extends the customer support experience to people who don't speak English, or who are more comfortable conversing in another language.
search_settings_Presentable_desc: Fields added as presentable are used in displaying the search results. Presentable fields are included in the result payload.
search_settings_highlighting_desc: Add fields which are to be used for highlighting the  in the search results
search_settings_loren_ipsum: Enable Synonyms Highlighting to highlight the original word that matches the synonym or the synonym itself
search_settings_enable_highlight_to_high: Enable Highlighting to highlight the query matches in the search results.It improves readability and helps users
search_settings_enable_highlight_identif: Enable Highlighting to highlight the query matches in the search results. It improves readability and helps users easily identify where the query matches are in the search results.
search_settings_spell_correction_desc: Enable spell correction to identify and correct the misspellings in the user’s query and improve the search results
search_settings_set_value_minimum_no_of_: Set value for the minimum number of characters a word should have to be spell corrected
search_setting_small_value_min_no_of_cha: For a very small value for minimum number of characters a word, you'll get a lot of false positive results.
search_setting_max_no_of_typos_will_be_c: Set value for the maximum number of typos that will be corrected in a word
search_settings_bot_action_desc: Enable or disable Bot Actions to trigger an event during the conversation with a virtual assistant
search_settings_enable_disable_desc: Enable or disable the bot action behaviour to auto execute the winning intent or to have the action prompts as a part of the search results
search_settings_bot_action_do_not_win_in: Do not auto execute the winning intent
search_settings_search_relevance_define_: Define the percentage of tokens in a query that should be present in a document so as to be returned in search results.
search_settings_search_relevance_configu: Configure search relevance to ensure serach results returned contains the subject, object and verb given in the search query
search_settings_search_relevance_subject: The subject in the search query must be present in the document to be included in the search result
search_settings_search_relevance_object_: The object in the search query must be present in the document to be included in the search result
search_settings_search_relevance_verb_de: The verb in the search query must be pesent in the document to be included in the search result
search_settings_key_value_pair: Add key-value pair in custom configuration to test out new features and capabilities
search_settings_empty_custom_config_desc: Please add the configurations key values
weights_please_add: Add the Searchable Field to Add Weight to it.
stopwords_desc: Enable stopwords to filter out the commonly used English words like 'a,' 'an,' 'the,' etc. from the user query before searching
stopwords_How_would_you_like_to_start: How would you like to start?
stopwords_Add_defaults_eg: Eg: If, Me, I, Can, Not, Won’t etc..
snippets_header_desc: A snippet is the description, summary or short answers from the most relevant search result. Snippets appear at the top of the search results and provide users with a quick answer to their questions.
smallTalk_header_desc: Small Talk refers to the casual conversations that a Search app can have with the end-users. Search apps that can answer social queries like 'How Are You?' create a positive impression with human touch.
synonyms_header_desc: Add synonyms to expand the search queries to retrieve better search results
